In Casa Hostal Toscanini 'Your sweet home South of Cali'. We stand out for providing our guests with a family atmosphere and personalized attention, we offer special rates of accommodation and meals for groups over 20 people and with a capacity limit of 75 people.The rate we are offering is promotional in multiple accommodation and The accommodation per room is maximum of four people..

Casa Hostal Toscanini is located in the south sector of the city, near the town's coliseum, velodrome, Pan-American courts, shopping centers, restaurants, movie theaters and three blocks away from the Santiago de Cali University, with easy access to the main thoroughfares

All rooms have air conditioning , private bathroom, TV, free WiFi zone and closet.

Our location allows you to be 5 minutes from the main universities such as: Santiago de Cali University, Universidad del Valle and 15 minutes from the universities located in the pance sector such as Autonomous University, Javeriana, Javeriana, San Buenaventura and ICESI.

description.description: Casa Hostal Toscanini  is close to hospitals in the city such as Maternal and Child Hospital, Farallones Clinic, Santillana Clinic, among others. It is also close to tourist places such as the Coliseo del Pueblo, Alcides Nieto Pati√±o Velodrome, Bullring, Country Club, Farallones Club and family recreation parks. It is the best accommodation option in the city of Santiago de Cali. Its excellent location in the south of the city makes the house, the ideal place to stay and get to know the surroundings.
